data.message: Oh shit I forgot to delete this social delinquent asking your fan's not to cross the line bringing politics in to your rhymes didn't think you would toe that line you got a new album out or something need some publicity to attract people to your rhymes you pissed me off with this political shit rip Eminem your crossed the line my friend

replies.message: how come he ain't crossed the line when he dissed Bill Clinton?
Deizy,thts a good question...this people seems to suffer from trumpiosis :-)

I mean, he's dissed every president (and presidential candidate) since the 90s, so I guess none of it matters since now Mango Unchained is in office and whatever he incoherently babbles about is supposed to be taken as absolute fact.

Yeah but at least he's going arfter the pedos that run the great united states of America even if he is one of them I'm English and don't really give a shit who runs your country as the WHO once said same as the old boss listen to that track it says it all he may babble butb he seems to want to make your  embarrassment of a country great again so diss him all you want who said 911 was a inside job oh yeah your President Mr trump
